confirmModal.title: Profile picture upload
confirmModal.description: Do you want to save this profile picture?

deleteAccount.title: Delete account
deleteAccount.description: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible and will delete all your data.

2fa.title: 2FA
2fa.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.
2fa.notEnabled: Two-factor authentication is not enabled. Enable it to secure your account.
2fa.enabled: Two-factor authentication is enabled for your account.

unlink2fa.title: Unlink 2FA
unlink2fa.description: To unlink 2FA, please enter the code from your authenticator app.

manage2fa.title: Manage 2FA
manage2fa.description: 2FA is already set up for your account. You can disable it by clicking the button below

setup2fa.title: Set up 2FA
setup2fa.description: To enhance your account security, please set up Time-based One-Time Password (2FA)
setup2fa.unableToScan: Unable to scan? You can show the secret key :

totpUnlink.title: 2FA unlinked
totpUnlink.description: Your two-factor authentication has been successfully removed. You can re-enable it at any time in your account settings.

successModal.title: Success
successModal.message: You successfully set-up TOTP authentication on your account. You will be prompted to enter the code on each log-in.

unlink.title: 2FA unlinked
unlink.description: Your two-factor authentication has been successfully removed. You can re-enable it at any time in your account settings.

delete.title: Delete environment
delete.confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this environment ?
delete.warning: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the environment named {{environmentName}}.

add.title: Add a member
add.description: Add a new member to the project {{projectName}}.

content.yourself: Are you sure you want to remove yourself from the project?
content.someoneElse: Are you sure you want to remove {{username}} from the project?

create.title: Create an environment
create.description: Create a new environment to manage your variables

delete.title: Delete Project
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete this project?
delete.content: Deleting this project will also delete all environments and variables associated with it.</ br>This action is irreversible.

environments.title: Environments
environments.noEnvironments: No environments found. Create one to manage your variables.

create.title: Create a project
create.description: Add a new project to start managing your environments.
create.placeholder: Enter a name for the project

noProjects.title: No projects found
noProjects.create: Create a project to get started

environment.title: {{name}} environment
environment.description: Manage variables in the {{environmentName}} environment of the {{projectName}} project

create.title: Create a variable
create.description: Create a new variable in the {{name}} environment

variable.title: Variables
variable.noVariables: Looks like there are no variables in this environment. Click the button above to create one.

delete.title: Delete a variable
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this variable ?This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the variable {{variableName}} from the {{environmentName}} environment.

delete.title: Delete environment
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete the environment {{environmentName}}?

edit.title: Edit environment
edit.placeholder: Enter a new name for the environment

logIn.title: Log-in
logIn.description: Please enter your credentials to log in.
